areas.name: AgentOps
areas.description: The operationalization of intelligent agents for workflows in software engineering, interactive computing, autonomous database management, and voice-driven application control.

areas.name: Intelligent Systems
areas.description: LLM-integrated use cases such as code generation, data preparation, and content moderation; the impact of Digital Twins for modeling, simulating, and optimizing real-world systems, especially for sustainability.

program.title: AgentOps Day
activities: Discussions focused on operationalizing intelligent agents

program.title: Intelligent Systems
activities: Discussions on AI-enhanced systems and sustainability

call_for_posters.description: We accept poster presentations related to any of the SEMLA topics. Accepted posters will be presented in a dedicated session, with select presenters eligible for travel grants or best poster prizes.
